languages.text: "Какие ж невиновные шарятся ночью по кухне, где еду травят? Не был бы он вредителем — оказался бы вором. Уж точно не кашу он пришел приправить".
"What kind of innocent man would skulk about a kitchen where food was being poisoned? If he wasn't a saboteur, he was a thief. Either way, he wasn't there to season the porridge, that's for sure."
languages.original_text: "Какие ж невиновные шарятся ночью по кухне, где еду травят? Не был бы он вредителем — оказался бы вором. Уж точно не кашу он пришел приправить".

traits.locale_text: "What kind of an innocent would skulk around the kitchen where food is being poisoned? If he weren't a saboteur, he would be a thief. He certainly didn't come to season the porridge."
"What kind of an innocent would skulk around the kitchen where food is being poisoned? If he weren't a saboteur, he would be a thief. He certainly didn't come to season the porridge."
"What kind of innocent man would skulk about a kitchen where food was being poisoned? If he was not a saboteur, he was a thief. Either way, was certainly not there to season the porridge."
"What kind of innocent man would skulk about a kitchen where food was being poisoned? If he was not a saboteur, he was a thief. Either way, was certainly not there to season the porridge."
"What kind of innocent man would skulk about a kitchen where food was being poisoned? If he wasn't a saboteur, he was a thief. Either way, he wasn't there to season the porridge, that's for sure."
"What kind of innocent man would skulk about a kitchen where food was being poisoned? If he wasn't a saboteur, he was a thief. Either way, he wasn't there to season the porridge, that's for sure."

languages.text: "Welcher Unschuldige würde in einer Küche herumschleichen, in der Lebensmittel vergiftet werden? Wenn er kein Saboteur war, dann war er ein Dieb. In jedem Fall wollte er nicht den Haferbrei würzen, so viel steht fest."
languages.original_text: "What kind of innocent man would skulk about a kitchen where food was being poisoned? If he wasn't a saboteur, he was a thief. Either way, he wasn't there to season the porridge, that's for sure."

traits.locale_text: "Welcher Unschuldige würde in einer Küche herumschleichen, in der Lebensmittel vergiftet werden? Wenn er kein Saboteur war, dann war er ein Dieb. In jedem Fall wollte er nicht den Haferbrei würzen, so viel steht fest."

languages.text: «¿Qué clase de inocente entraría a hurtadillas en una cocina donde luego la comida aparecía envenenada? O era un saboteador o era un ladrón. A condimentar las gachas desde luego no iba».
languages.original_text: "What kind of innocent man would skulk about a kitchen where food was being poisoned? If he wasn't a saboteur, he was a thief. Either way, he wasn't there to season the porridge, that's for sure."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué clase de inocente entraría a hurtadillas en una cocina donde luego la comida aparecía envenenada? O era un saboteador o era un ladrón. A condimentar las gachas desde luego no iba».

languages.text: 「食品に毒が盛られた厨房でコソコソする無実の男がいますか？犯人でなければ泥棒ですよ。いずれにせよ、お粥の味付けをするためにそこにいたわけではないことは確かです」
languages.original_text: "What kind of innocent man would skulk about a kitchen where food was being poisoned? If he wasn't a saboteur, he was a thief. Either way, he wasn't there to season the porridge, that's for sure."

traits.locale_text: 「食品に毒が盛られた厨房でコソコソする無実の男がいますか？犯人でなければ泥棒ですよ。いずれにせよ、お粥の味付けをするためにそこにいたわけではないことは確かです」

languages.text: “哪门子的无辜船员，会鬼鬼祟祟地跑到被下毒的厨房里？就算他不是投毒分子，那也肯定是小偷。不管怎么说，他当时肯定不是在给粥加调料，这一点我很确定。”
languages.original_text: "What kind of innocent man would skulk about a kitchen where food was being poisoned? If he wasn't a saboteur, he was a thief. Either way, he wasn't there to season the porridge, that's for sure."

traits.locale_text: “哪门子的无辜船员，会鬼鬼祟祟地跑到被下毒的厨房里？就算他不是投毒分子，那也肯定是小偷。不管怎么说，他当时肯定不是在给粥加调料，这一点我很确定。”

languages.text: « Un innocent ? Traînant dans une cuisine où la nourriture était empoisonnée ? Si ce n'était pas un saboteur, c'était au moins un voleur. Dans un cas comme dans l'autre, il n'était pas là pour assaisonner le gruau, croyez-moi. »
languages.original_text: "What kind of innocent man would skulk about a kitchen where food was being poisoned? If he wasn't a saboteur, he was a thief. Either way, he wasn't there to season the porridge, that's for sure."

traits.locale_text: « Un innocent ? Traînant dans une cuisine où la nourriture était empoisonnée ? Si ce n'était pas un saboteur, c'était au moins un voleur. Dans un cas comme dans l'autre, il n'était pas là pour assaisonner le gruau, croyez-moi. »

languages.text: "Masum bir adam, yiyeceklerin zehirlendiği bir mutfakta sinsice dolaşır mı? Sabotajcı değilse de hırsızın tekiydi. Ne olursa olsun, oraya lapaya çeşni katmaya gelmediği muhakkak."
languages.original_text: "What kind of innocent man would skulk about a kitchen where food was being poisoned? If he wasn't a saboteur, he was a thief. Either way, he wasn't there to season the porridge, that's for sure."
